subject: Order# SSN2267
description_text:
Hello I placed an order yesterday August 6, 2025 and would like to cancel the order. I cannot do so myself and would like to know how I can proceed?

Sent from Yahoo Mail for iPhone

conversations.body_text: Hi jeffery Gallimore,    I can cancel it for you. What problem did you encounter? We can modify your order for you.

Yes I would like it to be modified with adding the “Plus X pedal control box”.  Also can you add this order to my account?



Sent from Yahoo Mail for iPhone

Hi jeffery Gallimore,    You can click on the link to make the payment. We have already added the Plus X control box to your order. Please notify us after payment, and we will ship your order immediately.  https://www.simsonn.com/products/difference

Hi please cancel this order all together. I no longer need this I place a separate order for something else.


Sent from Yahoo Mail for iPhone
Hi jeffery Gallimore,    Okay, if it's a discount coupon or something, we can use it directly for you and recalculate the amount for a refund or additional payment. Are you sure you want to cancel?
